content: That sounds great, thanks for the recommendations. I'm actually thinking of visiting the museum on a weekday morning, and then grabbing lunch at one of the casual spots you mentioned earlier near the Riverwalk. After lunch, I might take a stroll along the Riverwalk and enjoy the views of the city. Since I've been to Chicago before, I'm not feeling too pressed to see all the major sights, and I'm happy to take a more relaxed approach this time around. By the way, I stayed at the Kimpton Hotel Monaco last time I was in Chicago, about a month ago, and really enjoyed the free wine hour and the quirky decor in the lobby.
